name: acorn
description: Acorn is software that helps people create the future

scripts.install-deps: npm install && npm run happ-install && npm run web-install && npm run electron-install && npm run electron-tsc
scripts.happ-reset: npm run happ-pack && npm run user-data-reset
scripts.user-data-reset: rm -rf user2-data && rm -rf user-data && mkdir user2-data user-data
scripts.web: cd web && ADMIN_WS_PORT=1234 APP_WS_PORT=8888 npx webpack-dev-server --config webpack.dev.js
scripts.web2: cd web && ADMIN_WS_PORT=1236 APP_WS_PORT=8899 npx webpack-dev-server --config webpack.dev.js
scripts.package-applet-ui: rimraf ui.zip && npm run applet-build && cd web/applet-dist && bestzip ../ui.zip index.js icon.png
scripts.package-applet: rimraf ./happ/workdir/acorn-applet.webhapp && npm run applet-happ-pack && npm run package-applet-ui && hc web-app pack ./happ/workdir/applet
scripts.electron2: cd electron && ACORN_TEST_USER_2=1 npm run start

author: Connor Turland <connor@sprillow.com>
